name: Validate Block Registry
description: Validates that all blocks in block_registry.js have required fields and sample data
prompt:
Please validate the block registry:

1. Check that all blocks have required fields: id, name, description, prompt, sampleInput
2. Verify that each block's id matches an entry in skeleton/sample_data.js
3. Check for duplicate block IDs
4. Ensure all block IDs use camelCase naming
5. Report any issues found or confirm all blocks are valid

Provide a clear summary of validation results.
